title: Strengthening Nursing Practical Competencies: Web-Based Case-Centered Science Education Design Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific concepts and experience with Web 2.0 tools
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design science education scenarios by applying Case-Based Reasoning (CBR) principles.
Learners can build a Web 2.0-based case library using scaffolding strategies.
Learners can iteratively improve case analysis activities by incorporating peer feedback at least three times.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
